title: First Things First....?
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>So, about the division of work for the joint event....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>The one sent by Eli-san and the others, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>We have so much to do! Rin is super excited nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yeah. We don’t have time to relax. Let’s immediately-....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ah, that’s right! Rin bought some pudding! Let’s eat them~. Here’s yours, Dia-san~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>My, matcha flavor! It’s my favorite.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehe, Rin knew that nya! Yours is this one, Umi-chan. It has lots of fruits!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>T-, thank you. But, we don’t have time to....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu. Let’s take this chance to prepare ourselves with energy before we start working hard, shall we?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I guess that would be good too. Thanks for the food, Rin. I’ll savor it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
